content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Greetings, Mr. Smith. I'm pleased to have you here. Let's indeed discuss the rental price of this fine apartment. How much are you willing to offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the size and location of the apartment. Would you be willing to start at 1,200 Euros per month?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: 1,200 Euros per month is an interesting offer, Mr. Smith. While it's a bit lower than my initial expectation, I'm open to considering it. How long are you planning to rent the apartment for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm looking to sign a one-year lease, Mr. Heine, with the possibility of extending if both parties are satisfied. Would that be acceptable to you?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: A one-year lease with the option to extend is quite common and would be acceptable to me, Mr. Smith. Let's focus on the rental price for now. Since you've made an offer, would you be willing to meet in the middle at 1,250 Euros per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Heinrich Heine
